item.title: docker - 创建 SSH 镜像
item.description: CentOSCentOS SSH 镜像 Dockerfile text FROM centos:centos7 LABEL maintainer="liwanggui" RUN curl -o /etc/yum.repos.d/CentOS-Base.repo https://repo.huaweicloud.com/repository/conf/CentOS-7-reg.repo \ && yum install -y openssh-server \ && yum install -y inetutils-ping iproute net-tools \ && yum clean all \ && echo '123456' | passwd --stdin root \ && ssh-keygen -t dsa -f /etc/ssh/ssh_host_dsa_key \ && ssh-keygen -t rsa -f /etc/ssh/ssh_host_rsa_key \ && ssh-keygen -t dsa -f /etc/ssh/ssh_host_ed25519_key \ && ssh-keygen -t dsa -f /etc/ssh/ssh_host_ecdsa_key
